mapper.sql: User_id, User_name, User_account, User_pwd, User_salt, User_State, User_date
mapper.select: select from ssm_user where User_name=#{userName} and User_pwd=#{userPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into ssm_user (User_id, User_name, User_account, User_pwd, User_salt, User_State, User_date) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

User_id,

mapper.update:
update ssm_user
User_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
User_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
User_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
User_salt = #{userSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
User_State = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
User_date = #{userDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where User_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
